name: Batman: Arkham City GOTY

task.app: dotnet20 dotnet35 physx mdx d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9_43 win10
task.description: Installing various winetricks. This might take a while....
task.name: winetricks

content:
game:
  appid: 200260
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet20 dotnet35 physx mdx d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9_43 win10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing various winetricks. This might take a while....
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  dumbxinputemu: true
  x360ce-path: $GAMEDIR/Binaries/Win32
